name: Taboo
description: Taboo is a word, guessing, and party game. The objective of the game is for a player to have their partners guess the word on the player's card without using the word itself or five additional words listed on the card.
basicRules: One player from a team is the 'giver'. The giver takes a card and tries to get their teammates to guess the word at the top of the card.
The giver cannot say any of the 'taboo' words listed on the card.
The giver's team has a limited amount of time (usually one minute) to guess as many words as possible.
One point is awarded for each correct guess. One point is deducted for each time a taboo word is used or for passing on a card.
The teams take turns, and the team with the most points at the end of the game wins.
tips: Think of synonyms for the word you are trying to describe.
Use gestures and sound effects to help your team guess.
If you are stuck on a word, it's better to pass than to risk using a taboo word.
